title: Best of the Program | 5/23/22
description:
Glenn and Stu share their thoughts on Bill Maher's latest "controversial" monologue regarding the number of people in the LGBTQ+ community. Glenn and Stu discuss the monkeypox disease and how it seems to be spread. Glenn and Stu discuss America's new dependency on food from other countries.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
